insert into uo_qywx_followuser_list(user_id, user_name, corp_id, insert_dt, insert_by) values
(#{item.userId}, #{item.userName}, #{item.corpId}, now(), #{item.insertBy})
on conflict(user_id) do update set user_name = excluded.user_name, corp_id = excluded.corp_id, update_dt = now(), update_by = excluded.insert_by

insert into uo_qywx_dept(id, name, corp_id, insert_dt, insert_by) values
(#{item.deptId}::integer, #{item.deptName}, #{item.corpId}, now(), #{item.insertBy})
on conflict(id) do update set name = excluded.name, corp_id = excluded.corp_id, update_dt = now(), update_by = excluded.insert_by
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, insert_dt, insert_by, update_dt, update_by, corp_id, flag from uo_qywx_followuser_list order by user_id asc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select id, name, parent_id, order_no, insert_dt, update_dt, enabled, corp_id, insert_by, update_by from uo_qywx_dept order by id asc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
